name: Lux Botanicals Honey & Lotus Hand Wash
description: Discover the new Lux Botanical Honey & Lotus handwash.  A luxurious handwash experience which is infused with pure honey & lotus extracts for the ultimate handwash experience.  Lux handwash provides 99. 9% germ protection, is mild on skin and leaves your skin feeling pampered with the inclusion of moisturizing glycerin.  Pamper & protect your hands with the exotic botanical fragrances and the power of nature.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
